special_text:
[+2]: Create a 0/1 green Treefolk creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[+1]: Muse 2. [i](Choose up to two counters on different other permanents you control and/or cards you own in exile. For each of them, remove it or add another.)[/i]
[-4]: Draw a card for each permanent you control and card you own in exile with one or more counters on it.
[-12]: Search your library for up to seven nonland permanent cards and exile each of them with a time counter on it. Each of those cards that doesn’t have suspend gains suspend.
